name: H-ISAC TAXII Feeds
description: The Polarity H-ISAC TAXII Feeds Integration retrieves Collections and Indicator Object data using H-ISAC's implementation of STIX 2.0 and TAXII 2.0.

options.name: H-ISAC TAXII Feed URL
options.description: The URL used for your H-ISAC TAXII Feed.

options.name: API Username
options.description: The API Username you will use to authenticate.

options.name: API Password
options.description: The API Password you will use to authenticate.

options.name: Refresh Data Time
options.description: The time for the how often to refresh your data from the TAXII system in Hours.
